column4: I just installed lucid on a drive with a GUID partition table. /boot is marked as an EFI System partition. grub-install warns about using blocklists, but i'm not sure how grub2 was setup  in the first place. Is it ok to --force?
Do you have EFI or BIOS?
Then you need a BIOS boot partition instead of an EFI system partition, http://grub.enbug.org/BIOS_Boot_Partition
